item.title: ROKU
item.description: score:1168 Chances: Roku reported strong Q2 results, exceeding Wall Street estimates. Roku’s stock price rose 50.5% in July due to impressive business performance. Positive outlook for Roku as a growth stock to consider buying. Potential for significant returns for Roku shareholders based on market share and opportunity.

item.title: SWN
item.description: score:992 Chances: Southwestern Energy reports positive Q2 2023 earnings with lower operating costs and expenses. Earnings and revenue surprises in Q2 2023 show potential positive momentum for Southwestern Energy (SWN). Strong sector performance by Permian Resources, Civitas Resources, and Northern Oil & Gas.
